subject: Access Bank PLC
body:
Access Bank PLC
Add:999c,Danmole Idejo Street,
Off Adeola Odeku Street,
Victoria Island, Lagos.Nigeria
Tel:+234 8182687048
Email: 
acessbankplcNG@execs.com
Web: /www.accessbankplc.com
 
 
ROM THE DESK OF: Mr.Herbert Wigwe
                                CEO/Managing Director
 
 Sir,                         RE: PAYMENT NOTIFICATION
IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AGREED UPON BY US (KEY)PRINCIPAL OFFICERS of ACCESS BANK NIGERIA  PLC ) AND TOP OFFICIALS OF THE GOVERNMENT ,THE OFFICIALS ON A RECENT DEBTS BUY BACKS AGREEMENT TOTALING THE SUM OF U$35M BEING BACKLOG FUND DUE IN FAVOR OF FOREIGN CONTRACTORS .
 WE ARE NOW UNDER LEGAL OBLIGATION TO OFF-SET YOUR OUTSTANDING CONTRACT FUND AS A RESULT, WE HAVE SET IN MOTION, EVERY NECESSARY MACHINERY TO DO THAT WITHIN AN EXPEDIENT TIME FRAME.
HOWEVER, FINAL EXECUTION OF ACTION/PAYMENT BY US IS SUBJECT TO YOU REVERTING TO US WITH THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION AS QUICK AS POSSIBLE:
 
1. FULL BANKING DETAILS &ADDRESS
2.BENEFICIARY  ADDRESS & MOBILE PHONE
3.OCCUPATION AND POSITION
 
THE ABOVE LISTED REQUIREMENTS MUST GET TO US AS QUICKLY AS POSSIBLE SO AS TO ENABLE US DO THE NEEDFUL EXERCISE AT OUR EARLIEST TIME, SINCE WE HAVE GOT VERY LIMITED TIME TO EXECUTE THIS PROGRAM.
Yours,
Mr.Herbert Wigwe
Chief Executive Officer
Access Bank Plc.

subject: Re:   Access Bank PLC
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment. I appreciate your prompt response and willingness to assist. However, before I provide you with any personal information, I would like to clarify a few things.

Could you please explain in more detail the nature of this payment? What is the purpose of this payment and why am I being contacted specifically? Additionally, can you provide any official documentation or reference numbers related to this transaction?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: Access Bank PLC
body:
Access Bank PLC 
 
 Add:999c,Danmole Idejo Street, 
 Off Adeola Odeku Street, 
 Victoria Island, Lagos.Nigeria 
 Tel:+234 8182687048 
 Email: acessbankplcNG@execs.com (mailto:acessbankplcNG@execs.com) Web: www.accessbankplc.com (https://deref-mail.com/mail/client/vnhBV13i75E/dereferrer/?redirectUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.accessbankplc.com) 
 
 
 ROM THE DESK OF: Mr.Herbert Wigwe CEO/Managing Director TO: Mr Mr.Kenneth, 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sir, 
 Excuse our late respomse,to your question. 
 Fund in question was part of the lodged fund by late president of Nigeria Lt.Gen. Sani Abacha  which was discovered with Union  bank of Switzerland,  the Swiss bank has decided to distribute it generously to lucky individuals and the America government and also the France president were  in agreement with the Swiss bank to distribute the fund to seventy  lucky  people in America, Europe, Asia and Africa. 
 
 The selection process was carried out through an electronic email ballot system  with  sole  aim   to select winners through the internet/email which is the best technology in recent time  to select winners all round the world and adding  the fact that it's exclusively reserved for the owner alone. 
 You have emerged among winners and the original owner to this email account which you have received this  winning notification letter. 
 
 we once again congratulate you and assure you of risk free transactions and above all,our determination and commitment to serve you better. 
 
 All legal backing documents will be made available to you as we progress.  
 
 Yours, Mr.Herbert Wigwe 
 Chief Executive Officer Access Bank Plc. 
 
 
 
 Sent: Friday, February 09, 2024 at 6:32 AM From: "Kenneth" <ve01367@***.com> To: acessbankplcng@execs.com Subject: Re: Access Bank PLC 
 
Hello, 
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment. I appreciate your prompt response and willingness to assist. However, before I provide you with any personal information, I would like to clarify a few things. 
Could you please explain in more detail the nature of this payment? What is the purpose of this payment and why am I being contacted specifically? Additionally, can you provide any official documentation or reference numbers related to this transaction? 
I look forward to your response.
Best wishes, 
Kenneth

subject: Re: Access Bank PLC
body:
Hello Kenneth,

Thank you for your interest in the information provided. I appreciate your curiosity and would be happy to provide more details about the nature of this payment.

The fund in question is part of the lodged fund by the late president of Nigeria, Sani Abacha, which was discovered with Union Bank of Switzerland. The Swiss bank has decided to distribute it generously to lucky individuals, including those in erica, Europe, Asia, and Africa. The selection process was carried out through an electronic email ballot system to select winners worldwide.

As a selected winner, you are entitled to receive a portion of this fund. The purpose of this payment is to distribute the funds as agreed upon by the Swiss bank, erica government, and France president. Rest assured that all legal documents will be provided as we progress.

I hope this clarifies things for you. If you have any further questions or require additional information, feel free to ask.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: Access Bank PLC
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your explanation about the fund being part of the late President Sani Abacha's lodged fund and the distribution process agreed upon by various parties.

I would like to understand more about how the selection process through an electronic email ballot system works. Could you elaborate on how winners are chosen and what criteria are used in this selection process?

Additionally, I am curious about the legal backing documents that will be provided as we progress. What kind of documents will be shared, and how will they ensure the legitimacy of this payment process?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kenneth
